Title: SpinningWheel for WPF
Description: A very simple and easy-configurable busy indicator for WPF.
HomeWiki:
Project Description
A very simple and easy-configurable busy indicator for WPF.

SpinningWheel is part of the Hammer UI Kit set. It lets you to put it over any control during long running processes, configure color, size, design and speed even in runtime.

To test all features a demo application is also attached.
